name: Information technology -- Generic coding of moving pictures and associated audio information (formal name)  MPEG-2 (common name) , Simple Profile
description: Profile of MPEG-2 that permits the use of Intra-coded (I) frames and predicted (P) frames. Uses color sampling of 4:2:0.
